amazon.name: Amazon Gift Card
amazon.description: Shop for millions of items on Amazon with versatile gift cards. From electronics to books, home goods to fashion - Amazon has everything you need.

starbucks.name: Starbucks Gift Card
starbucks.description: Delicious coffee, soft drinks, and baked goods, with countless locations across the globe. Perfect for your daily caffeine fix.

target.name: Target Gift Card
target.description: Shop for everything from groceries to electronics, clothing to home goods at Target stores nationwide.

visa.name: Visa Gift Card
visa.description: Use anywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. Perfect flexible gift with custom designs and no expiration date. Available from $10-$250.

bestbuy.name: Best Buy Gift Card
bestbuy.description: A destination for all things tech including TVs, appliances, game consoles, and more. Perfect for tech enthusiasts.

spotify.name: Spotify Gift Card
spotify.description: Digital music and podcast streaming, totally ad-free. Perfect for music lovers who want premium listening experience.

ebay.name: eBay Gift Card
ebay.description: One Card. So Many Options. Shop from billions of items in Electronics, Toys, Motors, Fashion, Home & Garden, Art, and Collectibles.

sephora.name: Sephora Gift Card
sephora.description: Offers a vast and diverse selection of prestige beauty products online and in 300+ stores nationwide. Perfect for beauty enthusiasts.

gamestop.name: GameStop Gift Card
gamestop.description: A family of specialty retail brands that makes the most popular gaming technologies affordable and accessible.

one4all.name: One4all Gift Card
one4all.description: Your digital ticket to a shopping extravaganza! Accepted at thousands of stores, giving the ultimate gift of choice with no fees.

adidas.name: Adidas Gift Card
adidas.description: Perfect for running shoes, winter-ready parkas, and quality activewear. Great for fitness enthusiasts and athletes.

nordstrom.name: Nordstrom Gift Card
nordstrom.description: Great destination for new clothes, accessories, and home goods, offering upscale shopping experiences.
